description: This file contains unit tests for the SQLite template in the universalinit project, testing project initialization, database creation, template variable replacement, and configuration loading.

classes.name: ProjectType
classes.description: Enumeration of project types, including SQLITE.

classes.name: TemplateInitInfo
classes.description: Contains initialization information for templates, including commands and URLs.

classes.name: ProjectInitializer
classes.description: Main class responsible for initializing projects based on templates.

classes.name: TemplateProvider
classes.description: Provides templates for different project types.

methods.name: load_config
methods.description: Loads project configuration from a JSON or YAML file.

methods.name: get_init_info
methods.description: Returns initialization info for the template.

methods.name: initialize_project
methods.description: Performs project initialization based on configuration.

methods.name: wait_for_post_process_completed
methods.description: Waits for post-processing scripts to complete.
